DOC.brief_summary: Investigation Glucose-dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide ( GIP ) effect hyper hypoglycemia type 1 diabetes .
DOC.criteria: • Diagnosed type 1 diabetes ( WHO criteria ) HbA1c > 9 % Liver disease ( ALAT/ASAT > 2 x upper normal limit ) Diabetic nephropathy ( screatinine > 130 µM albuminuria ) Proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( anamnestic ) Severe arteriosclerosis heart failure ( NYHA group III IV ) Anemia treatment medication applicable pause 12 hour Cpeptide increase 50 g iv arginine
